articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
help our frens @SpruceID improve Sign-in with Ethereum by dropping some feedback in the form below.
they're doing the lords work for the ecosystem 🤝
no PII required, just a few mins of your time
Spruce: We're conducting general research on how developers build dapps - specifically to learn more about how we can best support Sign-In with Ethereum development.
If you are a developer and have 3-5 minutes - we'd love to hear your feedback:
 https://forms.gle/L8jpMjVtVBk4i5HV8
articles.title: help our frens @SpruceID improve Sign-in with Ethereum by dropping some feedback in the form below. they're doing the lords work for the ecosystem �...

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
This kicking off now - go check out the awesome work the @ddschoolofcode team are doing for free open education 👑
D_D School Of Code: Join us with @IamVickjoe to discuss the future of web3 education, community and public goods on July 20th at 5 PM UTC 🗓 
We will be dropping some alpha for folks tuning in to this so hope to see y’all there 👀
 https://m.twitch.tv/githubeducation/schedule
articles.title: This kicking off now - go check out the awesome work the @ddschoolofcode team are doing for free open education 👑

RT Orbis, the web3 social protocol
Today is a big day, we are launching on @ceramicnetwork mainnet and opening our Orbis SDK!
Orbis is not a simple app anymore. It’s turning into the most performant web3 social protocol that anyone can use to build their own interconnected social experiences.
More details 👇🧵
